mozjpeg-search-in-path: MozJPEG has been not found in local directory. Searching in PATH...
mozjpeg-found-path:
Found MozJPEG in PATH: {path} 
Saving information in text file for faster startups...
mozjpeg-not-found-error:
MozJPEG has been not found in the system. Please check the installation guide:
https://github.com/fabulouskana/jpegzilla/blob/master/README.md#installation
window-title: Jpegzilla - A MozJPEG graphical user interface
save-all-title: Select directory to save compressed files to
open-in-image-viewer: Open in system default Image Viewer
help-info:
Run program by just typing "jpegzilla" or by running script without any arguments.
    -v, --version  - Display version information.
unknown-argument: Unknown argument. Type --help for more information.
